settings.title:
GPS Sports

Performance Tracking
settings.sub_title: Track, Analyze, and Boost Your Game Day Performance

settings.bold_text_mobile: Top players wear a GPS tracker to record their data, compare their metrics and improve their training and game day performance.

settings.text: Train smarter, optimize every training session and track your metrics as they improve game by game.

The PitcheroGPS Player App displays your performance data in a fun, easy-to-use app. No jargon. Just the metrics that matter to make you train smarter and run faster.

Interactive Heat Maps
Every session, training or game day, creates a series of interactive heat maps, showing your location and performance during the session.

Metrics that Matter
We only display the metrics that matter, no complex jargon. Just the metrics which make you a fitter, faster player to improve your performance.

Compare Your Stats
Every session is logged in Trends, a series of graphs plotting your performance over time. Set goals and watch your metrics improve with stunning graphics and charts.
FIFA and World Rugby approve the PitcheroGPS Player Tracker for use at all levels of competition including high school, college all the way up to the MLS and Premier League.
